review_data.title: Go for tapas!

review_data.title: Great dinner
review_data.content: Good wine, awesome food, nice staff, and great environment. Recommend the veal cheek and the tapas with pasta base (a bit spicy but delicious).

review_data.title: Viva España
review_data.content: This classic tapas bar makes up for in tapas what it lacks in space. All kinds of edible delights. A laid-back authentic venue. There’s nothing unusual here, no secret, just good traditional tapas made from fresh ingredients and with skill.

review_data.title: Authentic tapas in the middle of Zurich

review_data.content: I visit this place with my work colleagues and we really enjoyed the dinner with tapas&pintxos. If you look for Spanish quality food restaurant with a fair price and a really friendly service go to Casco Viejo. Best spanish food from town!

review_data.title: Best Spanish restaurant in Zürich
